attributes.action: to make MPs who have claimed expenses that are not wholly, exclusively and necessarily incurred in the course of Parliamentary duties, pay it back.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Parliamentary Green Book (2006) on Parliamentary expense rules states that MPs can claim reimbursement for the expenses provided they are wholly, exclusively and necessarily incurred in the course of Parliamentary duties.
MPs, that have claimed for expenses that were not incurred wholly, exclusively and necessarily in the course of Parliamentary duties should be made to pay it back.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
